comprehensive_overview: FastTree is a tool for inferring approximately-maximum-likelihood phylogenetic trees from alignments of nucleotide or protein sequences. FastTree can handle alignments with up to a few thousand sequences and has been designed to make trees with the minimum scale up to 100,000 sequences faster by approximating maximum-likelihood with heuristics.
core_features: Support for both nucleotide and protein sequences
Efficient handling of alignments with thousands of sequences
